rex_deposit_explanation: Any {{tokenSymbol}} deposited will be immediately available to either lend AND earn, or withdraw back into your account without any delays.
rex_deposit_about_to: You are about to deposit {{depositAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} to REX for lending
rex_withdraw_explanation: After withdrawing, your {{tokenSymbol}} tokens will be immediately available in your liquid balance.
rex_withdraw_about_to: You are about to withdraw {{withdrawalAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} back into your account
rex_buyrex_explanation: After lending your {{tokenSymbol}}, you will not be able to make them liquid again for at least 4 days. These are called 'maturity' dates.
rex_buyrex_about_to: You are about to lend {{buyAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} to the resource exchange market
rex_sellrex_explanation: After unlending {{tokenSymbol}}, you will no longer accrue interest from staking to REX.
rex_sellrex_about_to: You are about to unlend {{sellAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} from REX
rex_unstaketo_explanation: After unstaking your {{tokenSymbol}} for lending, you will not be able to make them liquid again for at least 4 days. These are called 'maturity' dates.
rex_rent_explanation: This will lend you {{tokenSymbol}} in exchange for your payment for a period of 30 days. After this period, you may request an additional loan for another 30-day term.
rex_rent_about_to: You are about to pay {{paymentAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} to borrow {{loanAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} in {{rentNETorCPU}} resources for {{receiver}}
rex_status_fund_coretokens_desc: {{tokenSymbol}} available for purchasing REX or for withdrawal
rex_status_fund_lenttokens_desc: Your total {{tokenSymbol}} tokens currently lent in the exchange
rex_status_fund_rexratio_desc: Amount you can borrow in exchange for paying 1 {{tokenSymbol}}
rex_status_fund_matured_desc: {{tokenSymbol}} earned as a result of lending to REX
rex_status_fund_profit_desc: {{tokenSymbol}} gains from lending tokens to REX pool
rex_savings_moveto_explanation: After moving your {{tokenSymbol}} to savings, they will be locked away until you move them from savings.
rex_savings_movefrom_explanation: {{tokenSymbol}} in savings are subject to the regular maturity period of 4 days starting from the end of the day.
rex_savings_moveto_about_to: You are about to move {{sellAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} to savings
rex_savings_movefrom_about_to: You are about to move {{sellAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} from savings
